full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer for Bulk Aviation Fuel
## Request Reference Number
WS3761283182-Doc4322594107

## Request Details
* Request Number: WS3761283182
* Publication Date: December 01, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 04, 2024, 2:00 P.M. EST
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Restricted Procurement: No
* Bid Period: 35 days

## Contract Details
* Duration: February 01, 2024 – April 01, 2025
* End Date: March 31, 2025
* North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code: 488119
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Status: Cancelled

## Solicitation Content
This is an invitation to qualify for an existing National Master Agreement (NMA). The solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous request [E60HL-230052/D] dated December 15, 2022.

## Bid Submission Requirements
Bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received on January 4, 2024, by 2:00 P.M. EST. Late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Bidder Inquiries
Bidder inquiries and feedback will be provided upon request.

## Contact Information
Contact Information:
Munz, Pam (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: None
Email: [pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Fax: None

## Regions and Locations
* Service Channels: Northwest Territories
* Other regions: Nova Scotia
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Alberta
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Prince Edward Island
* New Brunswick
* Manitoba
* Quebec (except NCR)
* British Columbia
* Saskatchewan
* Canada
